summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of redesigned Landing Page for aftersales.support. All 16 features tested successfully. Homepage redesign complete with corporate styling, images loading correctly, and responsive design working.
critical_code_review_comments: Company name shows 'Manish Malhotra' instead of 'aftersales.support' because it's fetched from admin settings - this is expected behavior per the requirements
context_for_next_testing_agent: Landing page redesign complete and tested. All sections verified: Hero with asymmetric layout, dashboard analytics image, floating stat cards (99.9% Uptime, <2hr Response), trust strip, stats bar with 4 KPIs, Trusted By section with 6 companies, bento grid features with server room and engineer images, testimonial image break, How It Works 3-step section, Pricing with 4 cards (Professional highlighted with cyan 'Most Popular' badge), and final CTA with workspace image. All images load from Unsplash/Pexels CDNs. Navigation links to /features, /pricing, /page/contact-us, /support work. CTAs link to /signup. Mobile responsive - no horizontal overflow.

features_tested.notes: Text on left, dashboard visual on right. Heading 'After-Sales Service. Before the Competition.' displays correctly
'Start Free Trial' and 'See How It Works' buttons present and clickable

features_tested.feature: Dashboard analytics image in hero visual

features_tested.notes: Uptime 99.9% and Avg Response < 2hr cards visible on desktop
'No credit card required', '14-day free trial', 'SOC 2 compliant' all visible
50,000+ Assets, 200+ MSPs & IT Teams, 99.9% Uptime, <2hr Avg Response - dark navy background
All 6 company names displayed with server icons: TechServe Solutions, CloudIT Partners, SecureNet MSP, ProSupport IT, InfraCare Systems, NetOps Global
Large image card with server room spanning 2 columns, AMC card with engineer image, 4 icon-only cards. All 6 feature cards have data-testid
Full-width image with quote about aftersales.support replacing 4 tools
Steps 01, 02, 03 with icons: Create Workspace, Import Assets, Start Delivering
Free Trial, Starter, Professional (highlighted with dark navy + cyan 'Most Popular' badge), Enterprise
Dark background with workspace image on right, 'Start Free Trial' and 'Talk to Sales' buttons
Features, Pricing, Contact, Support Portal links all functional with correct hrefs

features_tested.feature: All feature cards have data-testid attributes
Responsive design - images don't break layout
features_tested.notes: Mobile viewport (390x844) tested - no horizontal overflow, all sections render correctly
